channel.description: Recent content in vintage computing on Silviu's Blog

item.title: Repairing a Husky Hunter after reversing batteries.
item.description: Ok, I did it. For the first time since I can remember I inserted batteries wrongly and reversed polarity. And that in a device I’m pretty fond of, and I recently aquired: a Husky Hunter. It was only for a few seconds before I realized my mistake but it was enough, the computer was dead. I tried leaving it overnight with fresh batteries thinking that my mistake instantly depleted the onboard RAM battery (if it’s empty a Husky will just play dead until it gets a bit of charge).
